data.name: Double Pendulum Simulation
data.chapterDes: The clock hands, separated briefly, continue to tick. Struggle as they might, they will eventually return to that predetermined beginning.

data.name: Second Signal
data.unlockHint: 完成战役“双摆推演”关卡1-8后解锁
data.chapterDes: The disorganized information hidden beneath the calm surface surges forth, emerging from every crevice.

data.name: Lacuna Rectification
data.unlockHint: 完成战役“第二信号”关卡SL-2-5
data.chapterDes:
The missing puzzle piece has been found.
Where will your fingers guide it as they trace the fractured edge?

data.name: Reverse Matrix
data.unlockHint: 完成战役“缺位拟合”关卡3-10
data.chapterDes: You swim upstream through the billowing chaos.

data.name: Heterodyne Resonance
data.unlockHint: 完成战役“逆序矩阵”关卡SL-4-6后解锁
data.chapterDes: Under the onslaught of the torrent, elements with varying frequencies resist, drift, and converge, coalescing into a thundering dirge.

data.name: Harmonic Cycle
data.unlockHint: 完成战役“异频共振”关卡5-10后解锁
data.chapterDes: Smooth curves connect peaks and valleys. Before the start of the next cycle, a somewhat gentle slope appears.

data.name: Radiation Decay
data.unlockHint: 完成战役“简谐周期”关卡6-10后解锁
data.chapterDes: An unstable atomic core begins to decay; now is the time to choose.

data.name: Aliasing Effect
data.unlockHint: 完成战役“放射衰变”关卡7-10后解锁
data.chapterDes: Separate, yet travelling together, resonating on different frequencies, the splintered images finally overlap once again.
